title.narrative: Un-Habitat's Support To Urban 2030 - Monitoring And Reporting Of The Urban And Territorial Dimensions Of Sdg's

description.narrative: This action is implemented in the context Of cooperation Of UN-habitat (including theThematic Branches of HQ in Nairobi), DG REGIO and JRC on reporting the urban andterritorial dimensions Of implementing the Agenda 2030 in the EU (ref. para 37 of Asustainable European future: The EU response to the 2030 Agenda for SustainableDevelopment - Council conclusions (20 June 2017)1; and OP 2 and OP 8 ofA/RES/72/226 Implementation of the outcomes of the United Nations Conferences on Human Settlements and on Housing and Sustainable Urban Development and strengthening of the United Nations Human Settlements Programme the short term target Of this action is input the EU report to HLPF 2019, and medium term — input to midterm review of the Agenda 2030 and SDGs in 2022.UN Habitat is also a key partner in the Urban Agenda Of the European Union that is the key delivery mechanism of the New Urban Agenda within as established by both Council conclusions on " Habitat Ill, the EU and its member states objectives and priorities for the 3rd UN conference on housing and sustainable urban development and urban Agenda for the EU4

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Contribute towards the ongoing efforts on determining evidence of policy impacts, contribution of projects to Of the urban dimension of the SDGs and definition for the urban SDG targets and indicators.

title.narrative: Proposals produced on modifying definition for the urban SDG targets and indicators for the mid-term review of Agenda 2030

title.narrative: Help determine the contribution of EU policies to these Goals, and how this contribution could be measured. including use of SGD indicators, and how to improve them. This work may be supported and complemented by other relevant analysis.
